org.epics.pvData.pv
Interface PVDatabase

All Superinterfaces:
Requester
public interface PVDatabase
extends Requester

IOCDB (Input/Output Controller Database). An IOCDB contains record instance definitions.

Author:
mrk

mergeIntoMaster

void mergeIntoMaster()
Merge all definitions into the master IOCDB. After the merge all definitions are cleared from this IOCDB and this IOCDB is removed from the IOCDBFactory list.

findRecord

PVRecord findRecord(java.lang.String recordName)
Find the interface for a record instance. It will be returned if it resides in this IOCDB or in the master IOCDB.

Parameters:
recordName - The instance name.
Returns:
The interface or null if the record is not located.

message

void message(java.lang.String message,
             MessageType messageType)
Report a message. If no listeners are registered the messages are sent to System.out (info) or System.err (all other message types). If listeners are registered they are called.

Specified by:
message in interface Requester
Parameters:
message - The message.
messageType - The message type.
